document_data.name: cursed Imaskari horn
document_data.mainbody: the '''cursed Imaskari horn'''<ref group="note">Note that this horn is never referred to using this name in the book: it is merely described. was an Imaskari relic unearthed from the ruins of [[Solon]] by the slaves of [[Ambuchar Devayam]].{{cite book/Blood Charge|54}}
document_data.Description: This horn was made from black ivory.
document_data.Powers: When blown, this horn would cause an ancient black [[dragonne]] to arrive within ten minutes, looking for its long-lost master. On arrival, it would attack whoever blew the horn instead.
